data.name: Import_FileInfo
data.value: The Excel file must contain at least one column with the names of the participants. It is possible to have the names of the participants in English and French as well as a long name (limited to 100 characters) and a short name (limited to 42 characters). It is the latter that is used for positioning in the room and also the nameplate. You can download the templates by clicking on the links below.

data.value: Map the columns in the Excel sheet to the participant fields.

data.name: Import_MapData_UserInfo
data.value: You need to map the participant data in your Excel file to the information in the application. For each of the application fields, select the corresponding field in the Excel file. If the file to be imported has only one language, select the same field in the lists for all application fields.

data.value: Excel can't be launched. Check if Excel is properly installed and working on this computer.

data.name: Exception_NoExcelSheet
data.value: The name of the first sheet in the Excel file '{0}' could not be determined. The cause may be that the file is being used in another process. The process of generating the final document has been interrupted. Correct the issue and restart the process.

data.name: Exception_CopyExcelSourceToTemp
data.value: An error occurred while copying the Excel source file '{1}' to the temporary folder '{2}'. The process of creating the final file is aborted.

data.name: Exception_QueryFieldNotInDataSource
data.value: The query field '{0}' is not available in the data source file.

data.name: CreateDocument_KeepFormatedFile
data.value: Keep the temporary (formatted) Excel file after creating the final document

data.name: ContextualHelp_Parameter_MainTemplateRenameOptions
data.value: Activates the column formatting function of the Excel source file. All columns containing data are renamed, from the left, by C[x] where [x] represents the number of the column starting with 1. Columns whose name contains the separator / and whose row contents also contain the separator / are split in two. One column is inserted and contains the left part before the separator and the other the right part. Columns whose name does not contain a separator are not changed. The original name of the columns is kept in the second row in the Excel file to facilitate the creation/maintenance of Word templates. The original Excel file is not modified but a copy is created in the same folder as the original and its name is prefixed with "ListFlow_". The "temporary" Excel file is automatically deleted after the final document is created if the user does not check the option to keep this file in the last step of the process. If this option is not checked, the process uses the original Excel file without making any changes to it and therefore the column names as defined in the file.

data.name: ContextualHelp_Parameter_MainTemplateSplitOptions
data.value: Designates the name of the Excel column whose contents should be separated using the / separator

data.name: Data_FormatFile
data.value: The Excel file is being formatted, please wait...

data.name: Exception_ExcelDuplicateColumns
data.value: The Excel file has {0} columns with non-unique titles. To be able to generate the final document, the Excel file must not contain any column title that are not unique.

data.name: DupColumns_Message
data.value: The Excel file has {0} columns with non-unique titles. To be able to generate the final document, the Excel file must not contain any column title that are not unique. Correct the issue in the Excel file and restart the process of building the final document.

data.name: DupColumn_Message
data.value: The Excel file has one column with a non-unique title. To be able to generate the final document, the Excel file must not contain any column title that are not unique. Correct the issue in the Excel file and restart the process of building the final document.

data.name: ContextualHelp_DupColumn_ExcelColumnName
data.value: Name of the column in Excel format (A, B, ... AA)

data.name: ContextualHelp_DupColumn_ExcelColumnTitle
data.value: Title of the column as defined in Indico.UN

data.name: Exception_SubTemplateInProtectedView
data.value: The {0} sub-template has been opened in protected mode in Word because its source is not considered reliable (Internet download or attachment). In order to be used in ListFlow the sub-templates must be approved, therefore this sub-template will be ignored in the final document creation process. Click {1} to learn how to approve the sub-template.

data.name: Exception_SqlSyntaxIssue
data.value: The SQL query to select and sort data contains one syntax error. The sub-template being processed is ignored.

data.name: Exception_SqlSyntaxIssues
data.value: The SQL query to select and sort data contains {0} syntax errors. The sub-template being processed is ignored.
